title: They Won't Believe You
description: She saw him from across the street and a powerful rage ripped through her. He had stolen something from her, something she would never get back and now she was out for revenge.Kylie is in over her head. She thinks she can take on the man who ruined her life but sheâ€™s putting herself in incredible danger.Dark, brooding Craig watches over her, desperate to keep her safe. But how can he protect her if she won't reveal her darkest secrets?The closer she gets to Craig, the clearer it becomes that he has secrets of his own. With the odds stacked against them, can Kylie learn to trust and love again? Or will the darkness always pull her back?
author: Paisley Alice Quinn
